title: Possible nighttime sighting brings about ongoing investigation of several Cassadaga incidents and legend of the "Mole Man"
observed: Driving through  Florida and saw two large eyes about 6 feet off the ground. He was hiding behind a tree. We saw it when I turned on my high beams around midnight. We didn't get a good look at it but it was big.
location_details: Down by a post office is a sign saying left to cassadaga but there is a way to just keep going straight and we missed the cassadaga turn so we ended up going straight to the location.
